SUITE.NAME: All tests in: test Coverage Results

MESSAGE.value: Refactored for Heroku commit with conditionals in gemfile - be sure when run locally to add the "-e development" switch to your run statement.

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:agalford/BackChannel
Conflicts: .idea/.name .idea/modules.xml .idea/vcs.xml README
Merged CSS changes with new directory structure.
Corrected routing error for sign_in and sign_out.
Added rake task to "bootstrap" an admin user. See README for details.

Made search safe for nil classes
Still need to properly redirect search when it comes from within a reply view.
Post decay algorithm implemented Added post created date to main view.
Fixed search from within a post's reply view.
Added styles for notice and alerts
Added links on search page for found replies.
Removed the ability to delete from the search page, it was too easy to do a delete that would propagate
Model change, removed recoverable from devise
